item.title: Lobsters Top Stories: Saturday, February 8, 2025 at 7:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Gleam v1.8.0 released (57 points | 6 comments)
2. CPython tail-call interpreter merged for Python 3.14, a 10% speedup in benchmarks (35 points | 15 comments)
3. getaddrinfo sucks. everything else is much worse (18 points | 6 comments)
4. Refined: simple refinement types for Rust (12 points | 5 comments)
5. AI haters build tarpits to trap and trick AI scrapers that ignore robots.txt (8 points | 5 comments)
6. You Didn't Notice MP3 Is Now Free (48 points | 35 comments)
7. Comments on Shared Unix Hosting vs. the Cloud (28 points | 49 comments)
8. No-Libc Zig Now Outperforms Glibc Zig (4 points | no comments)
9. Cloudflare incident on February 6, 2025 (15 points | 1 comment)
10. Fun Friday: what's the weirdest automation you've ever made? (8 points | 21 comments)
11. Docker Bake is Now Generally Available (3 points | 1 comment)
12. numbat: A statically typed programming language for scientific computations with first class support for physical dimensions and units (17 points | 6 comments)
13. What are you doing this weekend? (10 points | 23 comments)
14. Asdf Version Manager Has Been Re-Written in Golang (59 points | 38 comments)
15. A Brief History of Code Signing at Mozilla (8 points | no comments)
16. polysubml-demo: A simple ML-like language with subtyping, polymorphism, higher rank types, and global type inference (7 points | no comments)
17. FOSDEM 2025 - 14 Years of systemd (16 points | 3 comments)
18. The Three Projections of Doctor Futamura (19 points | 5 comments)
19. HTML Whitespace is Broken (51 points | 42 comments)
20. The LLM Curve of Impact on Software Engineers (6 points | 7 comments)
21. It Is Time to Standardize Principles and Practices for Software Memory Safety (43 points | 22 comments)
22. CODE beyond FAIR (2 points | no comments)
23. DOOM running on Apple Lightning to HDMI dongle (20 points | 7 comments)
24. OpenWrt 24.10.0 - First Stable Release (14 points | 5 comments)
25. Updating a large codebase to Rust 2024 (18 points | 2 comments)
item.guid: Lobsters Top Stories: Saturday, February 8, 2025 at 7:15 AM UTC
